Definition: Funding must be matched by award(s) from another source
Only payable for costs directly incurred
Cannot be used for administrative purposes
Cannot be used for capital investment
Can only be used for salaries

Description: No Salary for Non-NZ Based Investigators
Definition: Can only be used for salaries for NZ based staff
Can only be used for infrastructure purchase or maintenance
Only a limited proportion (<5%) can be used for infrastructure purchase or maintenance
Cannot be used for RS&I activity
May be used for RS&I activity, or for non RS&I activity
